briefdescription.para: Enable or disable the color management menu.

detaileddescription.para: While the Viewer is always color managed, In some contexts, the color management may be controlled from an external UI making the menu unnecessary.

briefdescription.para: Creates a ViewerWindow widget and places it full screen on another screen.

detaileddescription.para: If screen is nullptr, the screen will be automatically selected as whichever one contains the mouse cursor.

briefdescription.para: Set either in or out point to the current playhead.

parameterdescription.para: Set to kTrimIn or kTrimOut for setting the in point or out point respectively.

briefdescription.para: Reset either the in or out point.

detaileddescription.para: Sets either the in point to 0 or the out point to RATIONAL_MAX.

parameterdescription.para: Set to kTrimIn or kTrimOut for setting the in point or out point respectively.

detaileddescription.para: As a widget, we don't handle panels, but a parent panel may pick this signal up.

briefdescription.para: Slot to center the horizontal scroll bar on the playhead's current position.

memberdef.argsstring: (const double &x, const double &x_scale, const rational &timebase, bool round=false)
memberdef.name: SceneToTime
